title: why am i the only bronze in my games?
body:
as the title says. so when i play ranked (I'm bronze 2 by the way) i am fighting silvers ONLY silvers i am the only bronze in the game (like 80% of the time) and I'm hard stuck i win some and i lose some. anyway if I'm the only bronze in the game and I'm fighting silvers WHY
WHY am i the only bronze player if I'm the only bronze player then shouldn't i be silver? and if not why am i not fighting other bronzes? 
so yeah that's my question

replies.body: If you're the only bronze 80% of the time, that might be a clue that you're actually better than bronze! It sounds to me like the system thinks you really shouldn't be in bronze so it keeps giving you matchups that you think are harder, when in actuality it's more evenly matched that way. Keep winning those matches and you should either shoot up in rank soon, or the matchmaking system will level out and start giving you fairer matchups.
Your hidden MMR could, in fact, be more lined up with SIlver players, but you'll still need to actively play and win games to climb up the ladder by getting to 100 LP and winning the promos.

After examining the problem, I came to the conclusion that the people you play with actually rank in LOW silver. But if you look closer to their winrates and MMR, you can see that their MMR is lower than silver. Therefore they are matched with you. (bronze) Because the game thinks it's the league they belong in. I hope this was useful.
It could be because you're playing at a time of day and/or year when a lot of other bronze players have given up on ranked for the remainder of the season.
im also getting silvers as teammates btw
